name: Switches (Windows)
description: Toggle switches for Windows system states and configurations

commands.name: WiFi Toggle
commands.switch: netsh interface show interface "Wi-Fi" | findstr "enabled" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles WiFi adapter on and off using netsh command. This allows you to quickly enable or disable wireless networking on your Windows system.

commands.name: Bluetooth Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "Get-PnpDevice -Class Bluetooth | Where-Object {$_.Status -eq "OK"} | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count" | findstr "0" >nul && echo "false" || echo "true"
commands.description: Toggles Bluetooth adapter on and off using PowerShell. This allows you to quickly enable or disable Bluetooth connectivity on your Windows system.

commands.name: Dark Mode Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "Get-ItemProperty -Path \"HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Themes\Personalize\" -Name \"AppsUseLightTheme\" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty AppsUseLightTheme" | findstr "0" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles between light and dark mode appearance using PowerShell. This changes the system-wide appearance to either light or dark theme.

commands.name: Sound Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "Get-AudioDevice -Playback | Where-Object {$_.Muted -eq $true} | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count" | findstr "0" >nul && echo "false" || echo "true"
commands.description: Toggles system audio mute on and off using PowerShell. This allows you to quickly mute or unmute all system sounds and audio output.

commands.name: Caps Lock Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "[Console]::CapsLock" | findstr "True" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Caps Lock on and off programmatically using PowerShell. This allows you to control the Caps Lock state through automation.

commands.name: Num Lock Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "[Console]::NumberLock" | findstr "True" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Num Lock on and off programmatically using PowerShell. This allows you to control the Num Lock state through automation.

commands.name: Docker Toggle
commands.switch: tasklist /FI "IMAGENAME eq Docker Desktop.exe" 2>NUL | find /I /N "Docker Desktop.exe">NUL && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Docker Desktop on and off. This starts or stops the Docker application for container management on Windows.

commands.name: MySQL Toggle
commands.switch: sc query mysql | findstr "RUNNING" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles MySQL database service on and off using net command. This starts or stops the MySQL server on Windows.

commands.name: PostgreSQL Toggle
commands.switch: sc query postgresql | findstr "RUNNING" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles PostgreSQL database service on and off using net command. This starts or stops the PostgreSQL server on Windows.

commands.name: Redis Toggle
commands.switch: sc query redis | findstr "RUNNING" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Redis service on and off using net command. This starts or stops the Redis in-memory database on Windows.

commands.name: Nginx Toggle
commands.switch: sc query nginx | findstr "RUNNING" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Nginx web server on and off using net command. This starts or stops the Nginx web server on Windows.

commands.name: Apache Toggle
commands.switch: sc query apache | findstr "RUNNING" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Apache web server on and off using net command. This starts or stops the Apache web server on Windows.

commands.name: Firewall Toggle
commands.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on
commands.switch: netsh advfirewall show allprofiles state | findstr "ON" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Windows Firewall on and off using netsh command. This enables or disables the built-in firewall for system security.

commands.name: VPN Toggle
commands.switch: rasdial | findstr "[vpn_name]" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles VPN connection on and off using rasdial command. This connects or disconnects from a configured VPN service.

commands.name: Hotspot Toggle
commands.command: netsh wlan set hostednetwork mode=allow ssid="[hotspot_name]" key="[password]"
commands.switch: netsh wlan show hostednetwork | findstr "Started" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Personal Hotspot on and off using netsh command. This enables or disables internet sharing on Windows.

commands.name: Taskbar Autohide Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "Get-ItemProperty -Path \"HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\StuckRects3\" -Name \"Settings\" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Settings" | findstr "0x02" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Taskbar autohide feature on and off using PowerShell. This makes the taskbar automatically hide when not in use.

commands.name: Night Light Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "Get-ItemProperty -Path \"HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CloudStore\Store\Cache\DefaultAccount\$$windows.data.bluelightreduction.bluelightreductionstate\$$windows.data.bluelightreduction.bluelightreductionstate\" -Name \"Data\" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Data" | findstr "0x01" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Night Light feature on and off using PowerShell. This reduces blue light emission during evening hours.

commands.name: Cortana Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "Get-AppxPackage -Name Microsoft.Windows.Cortana | Where-Object {$_.IsDisabled -eq $false} | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count" | findstr "0" >nul && echo "false" || echo "true"
commands.description: Toggles Cortana voice assistant on and off using PowerShell. This enables or disables the Cortana feature on Windows.

commands.name: Windows Update Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "Get-Service -Name wuauserv | Select-Object -ExpandProperty StartType" | findstr "Manual" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Windows Update service on and off using PowerShell. This enables or disables automatic system updates.

commands.name: Windows Defender Toggle
commands.switch: powershell -Command "Get-MpPreference | Select-Object -ExpandProperty DisableRealtimeMonitoring" | findstr "False" >nul && echo "true" || echo "false"
commands.description: Toggles Windows Defender real-time protection on and off using PowerShell. This enables or disables the antivirus protection.
